name: zksync-rpc-tester
description: A script to test ZKsync RPC methods

scripts.deploy:token:zk: source .env && TOKEN_NAME=$TOKEN_NAME TOKEN_SYMBOL=$TOKEN_SYMBOL forge script script/DeployERC20.s.sol --zksync --rpc-url $L2_RPC_URL --broadcast --verify --verifier zksync --verifier-url $VERIFIER_URL --zk-optimizer-mode 3
scripts.postinstall: forge install OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts && forge install foundry-rs/forge-std
